rules.description: Change left_control to hyper when held down
Change tab to tab when pressed alone, hyper when held down
Change tab to tab when pressed alone, left_control when held down
Home row mods - opt, ctrl, shift, command
Change Left Shift to Right Arrow if pressed alone; remain Left Shift if pressed with other keys.
Change caps_lock to left_cmd if pressed with other keys, change caps_lock to escape if pressed alone.
Change ; to ; when pressed alone, hyper when held down
Change caps_lock to left_control if pressed with other keys, change caps_lock to escape if pressed alone.
Change left_control to hyper when held down
Change tab to tab when pressed alone, hyper when held down
Change tab to tab when pressed alone, left_control when held down
Change Left Shift to Right Arrow if pressed alone; remain Left Shift if pressed with other keys.
Change left_control to left_control if pressed with other keys, change caps_lock to escape if pressed alone.
Change ; to ; when pressed alone, hyper when held down
Change left_control to hyper when held down
Change tab to tab when pressed alone, hyper when held down
Change tab to tab when pressed alone, left_control when held down
Change Left Shift to Right Arrow if pressed alone; remain Left Shift if pressed with other keys.
Change left_control to left_control if pressed with other keys, change caps_lock to escape if pressed alone.
Change ; to ; when pressed alone, hyper when held down
